desc: Homeschooling is not easy at all. But we are all in the same boat and we know exactely what you as a super hero Mom is doing. With our Calendar teaching Date, Season and Days are a breeze and never has been easier.

layout.text:
Learning At Home With
Multi Purpose Learning Tool

Imagine you have a really neat interactive calendar to give the children
an understanding of the date, year, month, weeks and days.
